title: Tips for Top pls :3  Gold+
body:
Hey Guys, 

I was just wondering i want to main top this season, Being a Sup main sorta sick of relying on players, 

i own all champs and Toplane imo is my weak point hence why i wanna git gud m8, 

These are the toplaners i can play: {{champion:126}}{{champion:78}}{{champion:8}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:41}} Occasionally  {{champion:14}} {{champion:27}}
i would say out of those Jayce and Poppy i just picked up, Vlad i main mid/top, Sion and Singed i just go super Tank. 

I would ask what do you think of these picks and what you would you recommend i should main

Would also prefer someone Gold or higher for some advice but any advice would be appreciated :)

replies.body: Always ward ;) control wards are pretty good right now, and they help to clear wards for the jungler to gank, since it clears the enemy's wards.

.. i was expecting a lot more advice than that.. ill take that into consideration? 

Thanks anyway lol  im pretty sure everyone whos Gold+ _"Should"_ know that...
its a piece of advice nonetheless. Don't take it for granted friend.
